welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shek Tong Tsui, Hong Kong! Immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture and stunning sights, known for its bustling markets and delicious street food. We invite you to explore and experience the charm of this beautiful city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hong Kong International Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by budget airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal of Hong Kong International Airport, mainly used for flights to and from mainland China.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.
